title: When will the S champion chests reset?
body: Doesn't seem to be reset yet.

replies.body: Those will reset once the next season officially starts!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0Q4Qd3Tv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-09T02:23:14.440+0000)
>
> Those will reset once the next season officially starts!

When is that? I thought it officially ended yesterday.
Season 7 is over. Preseason 8 started yesterday and season 8 usually starts around January so player can adapt to the new runes and masteries.
